title: Rebel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Attack any target at night. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You require one less vote to be executed.

> If you kill a Sentry, you require two less votes to be executed instead of one.

> If you kill the Sentry (Power), you will die the following night.

> You will always need at least 1 vote to be executed.

desc:
Post 2091
*"Imagine needing someone to tell you who to target."*
